title: Realtionship of military and stability in Nigeria

content.question: Describe how the Nigerian armed forces undermined the stability of the Nigerian state between 1960 and 1999. Identify the commander in chief of the armed forces in Nigeria as stipulated by the Nigerian Constitution of 1999. Describe how the Nigerian armed forces have been used to strengthen the stability of the Nigerian state since 1999.

frqParts.text: Describe how the Nigerian armed forces undermined the stability of the Nigerian state between 1960 and 1999. Identify the commander in chief of the armed forces in Nigeria as stipulated by the Nigerian Constitution of 1999. Describe how the Nigerian armed forces have been used to strengthen the stability of the Nigerian state since 1999.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
